publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3892 Mr John Swinney: Winter Words Festival at the Pitlochry Festival Theatre—That the Parliament congratulates the Pitlochry Festival Theatre on its second highly successful Winter Words Festival which took place from 26 to 29 January 2006; notes the contribution that the festival makes to education about, and appreciation of, literature; recognises that the event contributes significantly to the local economy of Highland Perthshire; applauds the theatre for its innovation in developing new events to ensure that it is open all year round as a centre for cultural and artistic activity; recognises the assistance given to this initiative by Perth and Kinross Council, the Scottish Arts Council, EventScotland, VisitScotland and the Scottish Book Trust, and acknowledges the importance of developing events of this nature to continue the achievements of the theatre in the future. Motions and amendments which have attracted additional support
S2M-3892 Winter Words Festival at the Pitlochry Festival Theatre (lodged on 30 January 2006) Michael Matheson*
S2M-3892 Winter Words Festival at the Pitlochry Festival Theatre (lodged on 30 January 2006) Donald Gorrie*, Christine Grahame*
